fields.label: AboutLT1a
fields.infoText:
This form is designed to be filled in on screen. You must answer all the questions except those marked "optional". You can't save the form but once you've completed it you'll be able to print a copy and post it.

Please complete this form with details of all the sites you operate. If you are applying to be registered as a group, you can include your site details on forms LT50. For more information about LT50 follow the link below:

LT50

You can also use LT51 instead of this form. For more information about LT51 follow the link below:

LT51

LT1A Notes

You do not need to include any sites which will not recieve further waste.

fields.label: Is a weighbridge used to establish the weight of waste on this site?
Does this site have a controller?
fields.helpText: If a person other than the operator determines what materials (if any) are disposed of at this site, or as part of this site, that person is a controller. A person who is purely acting as an agent or employee of someone else is not a controller. If there is a controller you should tick yes.
